sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_69a8900ddbddd3402acaf13daf9619e7
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>cf9d01d3e73003009d6247e603f6a990</enforce_acl><http_method>GET</http_method><name>Get test result</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
    var pathParams = request.pathParams;
    var queryParams = request.queryParams;
    var execution_tracker = pathParams.execution_tracker;

    var sysAtfTestResultGR = new GlideRecord('sys_atf_test_result');
    sysAtfTestResultGR.get('execution_tracker', execution_tracker);

    if (sysAtfTestResultGR.isValidRecord()) {
        return {
            output: sysAtfTestResultGR.output,
            run_time: sysAtfTestResultGR.run_time,
            status: sysAtfTestResultGR.status,
        };
    }

    return new sn_ws_err.NotFoundError('An error occured.');
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/snc/tdd/result/{execution_tracker}</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/result/{execution_tracker}</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>boris.buechel</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-04-04 06:05:44</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>69a8900ddbddd3402acaf13daf9619e7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Get test result</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_69a8900ddbddd3402acaf13daf9619e7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>boris.buechel</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-04-04 06:12:24</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="TDD">05619b8cdb9d53402acaf13daf961923</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_2ec0f536dbced3002acaf13daf961925
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>cf9d01d3e73003009d6247e603f6a990</enforce_acl><http_method>POST</http_method><name>Add test step</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process( /*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
    var pathParams = request.pathParams;
    var queryParams = request.queryParams;
    var sys_id = pathParams.sys_id;
    var requestBody = request.body;
    var order = requestBody.data.order || '100';
    var sysAtfStepGR;

    if (!sys_id || /[0-9a-f]{32}/.test(sys_id) === false) {
        return new sn_ws_err.BadRequestError('An error occured.');
    }

    sysAtfStepGR = new GlideRecord('sys_atf_step');
    sysAtfStepGR.initialize();
    sysAtfStepGR.setValue('order', order);
    // TODO: refactor hard-coded sys_id?
    sysAtfStepGR.setValue('step_config', '41de4a935332120028bc29cac2dc349a');
    sysAtfStepGR.setValue('test', sys_id);
    sysAtfStepGR.insert();

    response.setStatus(201);

    return {
        atf_steps: {
            order: sysAtfStepGR.order,
            description: sysAtfStepGR.description,
            sys_id: sysAtfStepGR.sys_id,
            sys_update_name: sysAtfStepGR.sys_update_name,
            script: sysAtfStepGR.inputs.script,
        },
    };
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/snc/tdd/test/{sys_id}</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/test/{sys_id}</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>boris.buechel</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-05-17 05:47:08</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>2ec0f536dbced3002acaf13daf961925</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Add test step</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_2ec0f536dbced3002acaf13daf961925</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>boris.buechel</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-05-17 06:08:38</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="TDD">05619b8cdb9d53402acaf13daf961923</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_92379c24dbd993402acaf13daf961980
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>cf9d01d3e73003009d6247e603f6a990</enforce_acl><http_method>PUT</http_method><name>Start test execution</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
    var pathParams = request.pathParams;
    var sys_id = pathParams.sys_id;
    var requestBody = request.body;
    var script = requestBody.data.script;
    var sysAtfStepGR;
    var userTest;

    if (!sys_id || /[0-9a-f]{32}/.test(sys_id) === false || !script) {
        return new sn_ws_err.BadRequestError('An error occured.');
    }

    sysAtfStepGR = new GlideRecord('sys_atf_step');
    userTest = new sn_atf.ExecuteUserTest();

    sysAtfStepGR.get(sys_id);
    sysAtfStepGR.inputs.script = script;
    sysAtfStepGR.setValue('step_config', '41de4a935332120028bc29cac2dc349a');

    if (sysAtfStepGR.update()) {
        userTest.setTestRecordSysId(sysAtfStepGR.test);
        execution_tracker = userTest.start();
        if (execution_tracker) {
            return {
                execution_tracker: execution_tracker,
            };
        }
    }
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/snc/tdd/step/{sys_id}</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/step/{sys_id}</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>boris.buechel</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-04-02 16:48:08</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>92379c24dbd993402acaf13daf961980</sys_id><sys_mod_count>42</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Start test execution</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_92379c24dbd993402acaf13daf961980</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>boris.buechel</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-05-17 05:53:24</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="TDD">05619b8cdb9d53402acaf13daf961923</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_6a71db8cdb9d53402acaf13daf961960
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>cf9d01d3e73003009d6247e603f6a990</enforce_acl><http_method>POST</http_method><name>Create a test</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
    var requestBody = request.body;
    var name = requestBody.data.name;
    var description = requestBody.data.description;
    var sysAtfTestGR = new GlideRecord('sys_atf_test');
    var sysAtfStepGR = new GlideRecord('sys_atf_step');
    var sysAtfStepConfigGR = new GlideRecord('sys_atf_step_config');
    var test_sys_id;

    if (name && description) {
        // TODO: refactor hard-coded sys_id?
        sysAtfStepConfigGR.get('41de4a935332120028bc29cac2dc349a');
        sysAtfTestGR.initialize();
        sysAtfTestGR.setValue('name', name);
        sysAtfTestGR.setValue('description', description);
        test_sys_id = sysAtfTestGR.insert();

        sysAtfStepGR.initialize();
        sysAtfStepGR.setValue('order', '1');
        sysAtfStepGR.setValue(
            'step_config',
            sysAtfStepConfigGR.getValue('sys_id')
        );
        sysAtfStepGR.setValue('test', test_sys_id);
        sysAtfStepGR.insert();

        response.setStatus(201);
        return {
            atf_test: {
                name: sysAtfTestGR.name,
                description: sysAtfTestGR.description,
                sys_id: sysAtfTestGR.sys_id,
                atf_steps: {
                    order: sysAtfStepGR.order,
                    description: sysAtfStepGR.description,
                    sys_id: sysAtfStepGR.sys_id,
                    sys_update_name: sysAtfStepGR.sys_update_name,
                    script: sysAtfStepGR.inputs.script,
                },
            },
        };
    }

    return new sn_ws_err.BadRequestError('An error occured.');
})(request, response);
]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/snc/tdd/test</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/test</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>boris.buechel</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-04-01 16:59:20</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>6a71db8cdb9d53402acaf13daf961960</sys_id><sys_mod_count>12</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Create a test</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_6a71db8cdb9d53402acaf13daf961960</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>boris.buechel</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-05-17 05:45:17</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="TDD">05619b8cdb9d53402acaf13daf961923</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>
